official_title: A bill to permit issuance of a certificate of documentation for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States for the vessel Fair Tide.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to issue for a named vessel a certificate of documentation for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to permit issuance of a certificate of documentation for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States for the vessel Fair Tide.
